snippet: For children in impoverished countries, where soccer balls donated by relief agencies often rip and quickly deflate, Tim Jahnigen has developed a ball that can last for decades.
abstract: Entrepreneur Tim Jahnigen and musician Sting fund and support One World Futbol, for children in impoverished countries who enjoy soccer; special soccer balls designed by Jahnigen bounce well, hold their shape and are estimated to last for 30 years, eliminating the need for thousands of hand-sewn leather balls that are typically donated by relief agencies.
lead_paragraph: For children in impoverished countries, where soccer balls donated by relief agencies often rip and quickly deflate, Tim Jahnigen has developed a ball that can last for decades.

headline.seo: The One World Futbol Promises a Lasting Source of Fun in Poor Countries
headline.main: Joy That Lasts, on the Poorest of Playgrounds
headline.print_headline: Joy That Lasts, On the Poorest Of Playgrounds
